content.description:
Human in [Cascadia][1] trying to do the right thing(s). **We have enough for everyone.**

- Working with software systems at [Fraction][2].
- Raising [Jerome and Sunshine][3] with [Kathleen][4]. 
- Tinkering with [@libra.fraction.io][5] and [@Current Events][6].

```
 _______________________________ 
< no cages, no gods, no masters >
 ------------------------------- 
        \   ^__^
         \  (oo)\_______
            (__)\       )\/\
                ||----w |
                ||     ||
```

[2]: https://fraction.io
